pull_request.body:
## Prerequisites

### To avoid invalid pull requests, please check and confirm following terms

- [X] This is not an ad/bug report;
- [X] My code follows the [guidelines](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md) and [syntax](https://kb.adguard.com/general/how-to-create-your-own-ad-filters) of this project;
- [X] I have performed a self-review of my own changes;
- [X] My changes do not break web sites, apps and files structure.

## What problem does the pull request fix?

### If the problem does not fall under any category that is listed here, please write a comment below in corresponding section

- [ ] Missed ads or ad leftovers;
- [ ] Website or app doesn't work properly;
- [ ] AdGuard gets detected on a website;
- [ ] Missed analytics or tracker;
- [ ] Social media buttons — share, like, tweet, etc;
- [ ] Annoyances — pop-ups, cookie warnings, etc;
- [X] Filters maintenance.

## What issue is being fixed?

### Enter the issue address

 - https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/issues/126594
 - https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/issues/120811
 - https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/issues/85721
 - https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/issues/109247
 - https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/issues/105308
 - https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/issues/108822

### Add your comment and screenshots

 - https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/issues/126594 - Cannot access.
 - https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/issues/120811 and https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/issues/85721 - Resolved by https://github.com/List-KR/List-KR/commit/42323ca65a314dd554cb61ec3d8af013fe0a4a6f.
 - https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/issues/109247 - Resolved by https://github.com/List-KR/List-KR/commit/97800fb295c46687b052caef8ed249d4266a7a90.
 - https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/issues/105308 - Resolved by List-KR.
 - https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/issues/108822 - `/torrentonly[0-9]+\.com/` domain is expired because its administrator changed its domain to `/torrentmode[0-9]+\.com/`. [^1][^2] Resolved by https://github.com/List-KR/List-KR/commit/cf9189dbcd43ac20407e87ecbc2cc1621ce29837.


### Terms

- [X] By submitting this issue, I agree that pull request does not contain private info and all conditions are met

[^1]: https://extrememanual.net/30553
[^2]: https://nopiamanual.net/%ED%86%A0%EB%A0%8C%ED%8A%B8%EC%98%A8%EB%A6%AC-%EC%A3%BC%EC%86%8C-torrentonly-%EC%82%AC%EC%9D%B4%ED%8A%B8-%EB%B0%94%EB%A1%9C%EA%B0%80%EA%B8%B0/

issue.title: aliexpress.ru
issue.body:
### Issue URL (Incorrect Blocking) [https://aliexpress.ru/](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Faliexpress.ru%2F) ### Comment Username: @lucelem > Какой-то из последних фильтров ломает авторизацию на Aliexpress. На втором скриншоте после ввода логина и пароля иногда появляется captcha, где нужно провести бегунком слева-направо. Не знаю, при каких обстоятельствах появляется эта captcha, но теперь у меня она не появляется, потому что я авторизовался с выключенным AdGuard. Повторная авторизация не показывает «капчи». Сломана не сама форма авторизации, а captcha, после ввода которой процесс авторизации не завершается, окно с введёнными логином и паролем не исчезает, повторные вводы «капчи» не дают результата. ### Screenshots

issue.title: AdGuard Tracking protection blocks comment counter on welt.de
issue.body:
### Prerequisites - [X] This site DOES NOT contains sexually explicit material, otherwise use [NSFW-specific form](./new?template=bug_report_NSFW.yml); - [X] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue; - [X] AdGuard product version is up-to-date; - [X] Browser version is up-to-date; - [X] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue. ### What product do you use? AdGuard for Mac ### AdGuard version 2.9.0.1206 ### What type of problem have you encountered? Website or app doesn't work properly ### Which browser(s) do you use? Safari ### Which device do you use? Desktop ### Where is the problem encountered? https://www.welt.de/politik/ausland/article241812759/Ukraine-News-USA-warnen-Russland-vor-Angriffen-auf-ihre-Satelliten.html ### What filters do you have enabled? AdGuard Tracking Protection filter ### What Stealth Mode options do you have enabled? _No response_ ### Add your comment and screenshots 1. When AdGuard Tracking Protection is active, the floating comment counter to the left is always 0, not matter how many comments there are. 2. Screenshots
Screenshot 1, Tracking Protection active:
Screenshot 2, Tracking Protection inactive:
### Privacy - [X] I agree to follow this condition

comment.body: It looks like that it's related to this issue - https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/issues/133210 and it has been fixed 2 days ago - https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/commit/1218b9600bf4cf985bfb3ac14e7d711d011e1bd8

issue.body:
### Issue URL (Incorrect Blocking) [https://amp.tgcom24.mediaset.it/tgcom24/article/56603092](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Famp.tgcom24.mediaset.it%2Ftgcom24%2Farticle%2F56603092) ### Comment > first time I load the site it doesn't scroll vertically. After disabling adguard I found the issue: on first load a cookie banner is showed. > With adguard enabled the banner is hidden, but since I didn't accept the cookies then the site scroll is blocked. Купил много лицензий. Проблемы начались больше года назад. И у меня и у жены. Телефоны не меняли, настройки тоже. Писал Вам. Ответ получил такой, что отбило всю охоту просить помощи дальше.
